title: Living Content | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Living Content | Joel Osteen
description:
You weren't created to spend your life waiting for something to happen so that you could feel fulfilled. Instead of looking to outside sources for fulfillment, let gratitude for God's blessings fill you with contentment in every season of life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
